sql.query:
SELECT e.*, s.firstName, s.lastName, s.family, c.startTimeDisplay, d.dayname, staff.firstName AS instructor_first, staff.lastName AS instructor_last, cl.name AS classlevel
FROM enrolments AS e
LEFT JOIN students AS s ON (s.uuid = e.student_uuid) LEFT JOIN classes AS c ON (c.uuid = e.class_uuid) LEFT JOIN days AS d ON (d.id = c.day) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.uuid = c.instructor_uuid) LEFT JOIN classLevels AS cl ON (cl.uuid = c.classlevel_uuid)
WHERE e.uuid = :P1 /* {{$_POST.uuid}} */

UPDATE enrolments
SET dropDate = :P1 /* {{$_POST.dropDate}} */, dropReason = :P2 /* {{$_POST.dropReason}} */
WHERE uuid = :P3 /* {{$_POST.uuid}} */

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'drop_remove_future_fees'

SELECT DISTINCT charge_uuid
FROM charges_enrolments
WHERE enrolment_uuid = :P1 /* {{$_POST.uuid}} */

SELECT chargeFor_monthly, family_uuid
FROM charges_family
WHERE uuid IN ({{query_enrolcharges.flatten('charge_uuid')}}) AND chargeFor_monthly >= :P1 /* {{$_POST.dropDate.startMonth().formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */

params.log: {{'DROP ENROLMENT: '+query_enrolment.firstName+' '+query_enrolment.lastName+' dropped from \\n'+query_enrolment.dayname+' - '+query_enrolment.startTimeDisplay+' '+query_enrolment.classlevel+' - '+query_enrolment.instructor_first+' '+query_enrolment.instructor_last.trunc(1, true, '.')+' \\n Drop Date: '+$_POST.dropDate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}}
